tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was recommended Dr Brunda by my relative. When I checked reviews about her on Practo I was a little reluctant as many said she’s strict and straightforward but anyway I went ahead and let me tell that you that’s the best thing that I did.  I was 47 kilos when I was 6 weeks pregnant I was very worried about it but when I met her she said I’m healthy and she got all the necessary tests done to make sure everything is fine.. the reports said I had very low iron levels and Vit D. So she immediately gave me the necessary tablets and she made sure she cross checked everything just to be on the safer side which I really appreciate... not every doctor would take that extra step.  Usually we see pregnancy as a sickness but this doctor made my pregnancy like a cakewalk. She didn’t warn me about anything she said all you have to do is eat healthy and be normal like how I was before pregnancy..in my third trimester I opted for elective c-section ( it was my decision) she suggested we could go for induced labour but I obliged. She neatly explained the pros and cons of a surgery. Then in my 39th I delivered a baby girl. Doc was on time and she did the surgery with so much ease.. I wasn’t on general anaesthesia so I had an idea of what was happening around me. She kept talking to me throughout the surgery and I felt so relieved. I trusted her completely. Then came post partum she made sure she changed my supplements and she even suggested on what I should eat and she kept a tab on my iron levels by getting my blood tested. So be it pre or during or post pregnancy she was there throughout my journey with the same enthusiasm. I would definitely recommend her because she’s such a professional. 
She also has her own clinic. First health clinic which is close by to Cloudnine Jayanagar. Sometimes when I had to just show her my report I’d go to her clinic because it wasn’t as crowded as Cloudnine. 
I’d give her a 10 on 10 for her professionalism and the way she deals with situations. She’s one amazing doctor and a person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Brunda madam was firstly very friendly person or can say someone who’s very known to us  who tries to make us understand whats the issue happening with our body what is the alternatives methods can be done also she suggested me what kind of treatment goes well with my condition 
Also out of the treatment she suggested me other health tips for my further healthier pregnancy. 
Seeing positive negative comments about her i felt little scared that she is straight forward in talk and also half minded before meeting her but then when i met her and spoke to her about my issue happening she calmly listened to me and told me wait for sometime and do scanning again. She gave me a positive hope which other 3 doctors dint gave me a hope wherein i met for the same issue. 
I would highly recommend brunda madam

Doctor had recommended Cervical Cancer vaccine to my wife. However her prescription lacks clarity. Everytime, my wife has to take doses she has to go through an administration nightmare at the hospital. This is unprofessional and shows apathy towards patients. Also, she needs to be friendly and sympathetic towarda her patients. She is cold and calculative.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had an amazing experience. I have been visiting her on and off for all issues since last 10 years now.  She is straightforward and to the point, saves my time and I dont have to dig for hidden meaning. One of the most genuine, honest and dedicated doctor i have ever met. She may not be smiling unnecessarily, may look serious, but she is the one you can depend on for your life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was following up in bellandur cloudnine as that branch was near to my home. I had BP issues and swelling from my 34th week. in 35th week I shifted ti my brother place in BSK hence went for 1st check up to jayanagar branch and Luckily it was Brunda I chose to be my gynec. she immediately found risk in 35th week and immediately called for surgery and took all necessary actions. each and every step she explained to me why she is taking that steps and all. I had issues with pedestrian team there also she was checking about my health and showed concern. I also read that she straight forward very strict and all but all that can be ignored for her effective treatment. wonderful DOC
She is incredibly competent and honest. She will help you understand exactly where you are and provide guidance on what needs to be done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I never refer Dr brunda she is not friendly didn't explain about health issue no good advice *** ** *** ****** Every time I visit she has given some or the other test didn't started the treatment  three to four times I visited.
Doctor is not friendly. Raises her voice in front of everyone . If I ask questions, she talks unnecessary things .
The wait time is high and we couldn't meet the dr we booked. The front desk is not recognizing the practo app
She will given very good suggestion ,right method diagnosis, economic free, satisfied with treatment
